- $GOOGL and $AMZN are often cited as having the most ‚Äúreasonable‚Äù P/E multiples versus their growth and AI upside.
- $AAPL and $MSFT are increasingly being viewed as quality compounders where investors are willing to pay a premium for stability, (7/10)
